overview:
Ronnie C. Wright Brewcups Prior to founding Brewcups, Ronnie C. Wright led his Platemate brand to a 2008 Inc. Magazine “Inc. 5000 Honor” in media & technology. As the world’s first Acroneticist and plant-based diet pioneer behind the Stayfine Diet, Wright received an Honorary Doctors in Complex Systems and is Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer. He is a graduate of the University of Florida. After a successful track record as an economic development planner, Wright became a Fellow with the International Hall of Fame of Inventors.

With a defined platform of “Luxury, Diet & Wellness,” Wright has a vision for social media in a [CUP] > ‘Community Uniquely Personal’ to enable ‘Computing Uniquely Powerful’ through a ‘Completely Unique Platform.’ Wright once interviewed with a Wall Street firm to become an investment banker, which turned out to be a blessing. He received a historically high score through the process - and, was offered the job. He turned it down when the manager said, “Based on your test score - you should be running a Fortune 500 company like Bill Gates or Ted Turner.” Wright smiled and said, “You just gave me my answer.” He began working on his Stayfine holding company brands and later Brewcups
